quest.name: Leves of Swiftperch
journal: T'mokkri is responsible for assigning guildleves at the Drowning Wench, and is offering to give you an introduction to the world of levequests.

Guildleves are the means by which the Adventurers' Guild organizes and assigns the various requests made by the citizenry. To accept your first such task, make your way to Swiftperch and speak with Swygskyf.
In order to gauge your ability to handle the various guildleves he has to offer, Swygskyf requires that you carry out a preliminary task.
You have successfully completed the trial guildleve. Report to Swygskyf at Swiftperch.

Swygskyf is now confident that you are capable of handling any of the trials and tribulations you might encounter at Swiftperch. Prove your worth as an adventurer, and continue to undertake the guildleves he has to offer.

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename. Baderon has been most effusive in his praise of your accomplishments. Have you considered putting your abilities to use for the Adventurers' Guild by undertaking a guildleve or two?

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: Guildleves are the means by which we document requests for assistance from the citizenry, prior to assigning them to adventurers possessed of the necessary skills.

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: From “battlecraft leves” that require the extermination of monsters, to “tradecraft leves” that ask for the creation of goods, the tasks we term “levequests” are many and varied in their nature.

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: Should your interest be piqued, I suggest you make your way to Swiftperch and speak with Swygskyf. He will be happy to set your feet on the path to completing your first levequest.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Greetin's, lasslad. Me name's Swygskyf, and I'm in charge of assignin' local levequests here at Swiftperch.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: T'mokkri sent ye my way, did she? Well then, let's get ye started...

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: ...right after we see if ye've got the brass to overcome the challenges yer likely to encounter 'round these parts.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Take a look over the task outlined in this guildleve. Ye reckon ye can handle it?

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Good to hear. Now, megalocrabs, they like to run off to their mates when they're feelin' overmatched. If ye don't want to find yerself armpits-deep in snippers, then ye'd best finish 'em quickly.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Open your journal under Duty in the main menu, and begin the selected levequest by pressing the “Initiate” button.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When a megalocrab feels overmatched, it will flee the battle. If it reaches a certain distance, then another megalocrab will appear. The levequest objective can be more easily achieved by slaying the fleeing creature before it is joined by more of its kind.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Ye seem to have had little trouble, lasslad. Here's the reward for yer efforts.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Aye, I reckon ye'll do just fine with the rest o' me jobs.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: And there's always plenty to do here at Swiftperch, what with all the rebuildin' and such. Be sure to make yerself useful!

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Oh, by the by, a sturdy 'venturer like yerself might want to look into guildhests as well.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Have a word with Battlewarden Tiroro, and she'll give ye the details. Don't ye fret now, lasslad─I'll set her straight if she has any doubts as to yer ability.

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: If you mean to undertake a guildleve, then make your way to Swiftperch and speak with Swygskyf.

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: I see you wasted no time in taking my suggestion! Be sure to follow Swygskyf's instructions for carrying out your levequest.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: Not havin' second thoughts now, are ye?

dialogue.name: TMOKKRI
dialogue.text: You must be overjoyed to have performed so admirably in the task Swygskyf set you. I imagine he is eager to hear of your success.

dialogue.name: SWYGSKYF
dialogue.text: How do ye fare? Levequests ain't the easiest jobs in the world, but I reckon yer equal to the task.
